name: childrencalculationgame
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: children calculation game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
children calculation game
Since my daughter soon attends the first class of school and has a lot of fun with math, I have developed the „children calculation game“ Skill.

It is intended to consolidate the basic arithmetic operations in a playful way.
children calculation game has different math tasks, this version of the skill calculates up to 20 and only adding and subtracting is practiced.
You can set up your personal highscore and try to crack it with every new start, so the joy of children calculation game remains longer and a certain ambition is aroused.

Skill start: "Alexa open children calculation game "
It is always possible to go back to the main menu and select a new calculation type.
Just say "Menu".
End skill: "End"

This skill is also suitable for the Echo Show and Echo Spot.
If you have one of these devices, the task will be shown on the above mentioned devices.
Please note that you have to activate skills for children in the Amazon Alexa App to use this skill.
We would appreciate any feedback / evaluation and suggestions for improvement / suggestions for further functions.

Hints:
The Amazon-Device-UserID is stored in a database so that the highscore can be assigned. You can remove both your Highscore and your UserID from the database at any time.
Please contact us at info@skillprojekt.com. for this purpose.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
